scripts.build-release: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-api && npm run add-wasm-path
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && npm run build-api && npm run add-wasm-path
scripts.release_publish: npm run build-release && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build-wasm-debug: em++ --bind -O3 -g4 -std=c++17 --source-map-base http://localhost:5000/web-ifc-js/wasm-lib/ -flto -fno-exceptions ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s ASSERTIONS=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS"] -O3 -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release: em++ --bind -O3 -std=c++17 -flto -fno-exceptions ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS"] -O3 -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-api: cpy src/*.ts dist && npm run build-ts-api && npm run build-web-ifc-api-mjs && npm run build-web-ifc-api-node && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.build-ts-api: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && cpy dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts dist && cpy dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts dist --rename=web-ifc-api-node.d.ts
scripts.copy-to-dist: cpy README.md dist && cpy package.json dist && cpy src/ifc2x4.ts dist
scripts.build-viewer: npm run bundle-viewer && npm run copy-wasm-viewer
